text: The Manipur white-toothed rat (, ) is a species of rodent. It belongs to the family Muridae. It is found in Manipur of Northeastern India, northern and central Myanmar and Yunnan province of China (west of the Salween River). == Home == In India, it is found in # Bishenpur, Senapati and Imphal in Manipur # Golaghat in Assam # Kekrima Hills and Naga Hills in Nagaland == References == == Other websites == Category:Flora and fauna of Manipur Category:Old World rats and mice Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Manipur white-toothed rat
